#summary Build process for new release

= Introduction =

Steps for building a new release.

= Details =

To make a distribution:

1) Re-run /Developer/Applications/Utilities/Help Indexer 

2) Update version number in InfoPlist.strings

3) build/switchlistTag SwitchList.version.with.dots

4) Run build/makeDistribution SwitchList.version.with.dots

5) Test

6) Copy /tmp/SwitchList-version.dmg to /Volumes/rbowdidge/Sites/railroad/SwitchList-version.dmg

7) Copy /tmp/SwitchList-version.dmg to /Volumes/rbowdidge/Sites/railroad/SwitchList.dmg

8) Update web page to show new version.

10) Announce on SwitchList-discuss
~
